section.name: Cards panel
section.span: What and where is the cards panel?

div.p: The cards panel. Is for content. Call it content panel, file panel, present panel?

section.p: The cards panel is for changing and reviewing files (documents, images or assets). The cards panel holds one or more cards. Each card shows a document, image or asset. The cards are lying on top of each other, so you can actually see only the upper one. But you can easily switch between them: Each card has a tab at its upper edge and tabs of all cards are visible at all time. You can click on a tab to put that card on top.

The cards panel only exists when you have pulled out at least one card from the repository. When you put back the last card, the cards panel goes away. The region on your screen that was occupied by the cards panel may then become empty, show a nice image or show another panel.
